name: Fortro Ltd

what_you_do: Sandro Forte is an entrepreneur, international speaker, success coach, and best-selling author who delivers motivational talks and workshops focused on leadership, peak performance, and personal development.
who_you_serve: Sandro serves businesses and organizations looking for inspiration and guidance in leadership, sales, and personal growth, appealing to both corporate clients and individual professionals.
signature_programs: Dare to be Different, The Success Masterclass Programme
bio: Best-selling author of 'Dare to be Different', raised over £25 million for charitable causes, featured speaker at national and global conferences.
